metadata.title: CVE-2019-1010189 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: mgetty prior to version 1.2.1 is affected by: Infinite Loop. The impact is:DoS, the program does never terminates. The component is: g3/g32pbm.c. Theattack vector is: Local, the user should open a specially crafted file. Thefixed version is: 1.2.1.

criterions.comment: mgetty package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
